title: ENH: Improve readability of short help
body:
- sort commands alphabetically (there is no point in maintaining a
  semantic structure within a single line)
- wrap to 70 chars line length to match option display
- introduce spaces between commands to improve readability

Was:
```
Usage: datalad [-l LEVEL] [--pbs-runner {condor}] [-C PATH] [--version]
               [--dbg] [--idbg] [-c KEY=VALUE]
               [-f {default,json,json_pp,tailored,'<template>'}]
               [--report-status {success,failure,ok,notneeded,impossible,error}]
               [--report-type {dataset,file}]
               [--on-failure {ignore,continue,stop}]
               [--proc-pre <PROCEDURE NAME> [ARGS ...]]
               [--proc-post <PROCEDURE NAME> [ARGS ...]] [--cmd] [-h]
               {create,install,get,add,publish,uninstall,drop,remove,update,create-sibling,create-sibling-github,create-sibling-gitlab,unlock,save,search,metadata,aggregate-metadata,extract-metadata,containers-list,containers-remove,containers-add,containers-run,crawl,crawl-init,meta-dump,meta-extract,meta-aggregate,ria-export-archive,wtf,test,ls,clean,add-archive-content,download-url,run,rerun,run-procedure,addurls,export-archive,check-dates,export-to-figshare,no-annex,add-readme,annotate-paths,clone,create-test-dataset,status,diff,siblings,sshrun,subdatasets}
               ...
```

Is:

```
Usage: datalad [-l LEVEL] [--pbs-runner {condor}] [-C PATH] [--version]
               [--dbg] [--idbg] [-c KEY=VALUE]
               [-f {default,json,json_pp,tailored,'<template>'}]
               [--report-status {success,failure,ok,notneeded,impossible,error}]
               [--report-type {dataset,file}]
               [--on-failure {ignore,continue,stop}]
               [--proc-pre <PROCEDURE NAME> [ARGS ...]]
               [--proc-post <PROCEDURE NAME> [ARGS ...]] [--cmd] [-h]
               {add, add-archive-content, add-readme, addurls, aggregate-metadata,
                annotate-paths, check-dates, clean, clone,
                containers-add, containers-list, containers-remove,
                containers-run, crawl, crawl-init, create,
                create-sibling, create-sibling-github,
                create-sibling-gitlab, create-test-dataset, diff,
                download-url, drop, export-archive,
                export-to-figshare, extract-metadata, get, install,
                ls, meta-aggregate, meta-dump, meta-extract, metadata,
                no-annex, publish, remove, rerun, ria-export-archive,
                run, run-procedure, save, search, siblings, sshrun,
                status, subdatasets, test, uninstall, unlock, update,
                wtf}
               ...
```
